definitions.definition: The process of having something fitted again, repaired or restored.
definitions.example: The ship required a refit before setting out again.

definitions.definition: To fit again; to put back into its place.
To prepare for use again; to repair or restore.
definitions.example: to refit a garment; to refit ships of war

definitions.definition: To fit out or supply again (with something).
To prepare a vessel for use again (e.g. by replenishing depleted supplies or doing maintenance or repair work); (of a vessel) to be prepared for use again.
